item.title: CVE-2024-37208|2024-07-06T09:47:38.766Z -- robert%20macchi -- wp%20scraper
item.description: Server-Side Request Forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Robert Macchi WP Scraper.This issue affects WP Scraper: from n/a through 5.7.
